channel.title: Help port forwarding
channel.description: ok, i think i understand this whole port forwarding thing i just need a little help. what do i make the application name and what do i name the port? i believe i make the ports all 43594 and i make the host device owner-pc. i set the bubble as host. and i set it for port forwarding. do i need to set a tmp and umd or whatever they are or only one or the other? if i could get these answers answered and my server works the person who gave me the answers can be free admin.

item.title: Help port forwarding
item.dc:creator: @senorlemon senorlemon
item.description:
@senorlemon wrote:

ok, i think i understand this whole port forwarding thing i just need a little help. what do i make the application name and what do i name the port? i believe i make the ports all 43594 and i make the host device owner-pc. i set the bubble as host. and i set it for port forwarding. do i need to set a tmp and umd or whatever they are or only one or the other? if i could get these answers answered and my server works the person who gave me the answers can be free admin.
